etymology.description: 金(金) (jīn, 'metal') + 蒦(蒦) (huò, 'pot') — metal used for making a pot
etymology.interpretation: The character illustrates a metal pot as it combines the concept of 金(金) (jīn, 'metal') with 蒦(蒦) (huò, 'pot'). This makes intuitive sense, as pots are traditionally made from metal.

examples.chinese: 这个镬是用来煮汤的。(這個鑊是用來煮湯的。)
examples.pinyin: zhè ge huò shì yòng lái zhǔ tāng de。
examples.english: This pot is used for cooking soup.

examples.chinese: 我买了一个新的镬。(我買了個新的鑊。)
examples.pinyin: wǒ mǎi le yí gè xīn de huò。
